title: Puerto Rico ordered to resume primary after ballot shortage suspended election

title: Lebanon struggling after deadly Beirut explosion
description: Correspondent for NBC News, Rebecca Collard, breaks down the worsening crisis in Beirut after the massive explosion that left many dead and thousands injured.

author: NBCNews.com
title: Quarantines and closures as schools reopen across the U.S.
description: Many schools nationwide are already closing down or quarantining students and staff because of the coronavirus. New research from the University of Florida finds that the virus can travel up to 16 feet, adding to concerns about students in classrooms.
source.name: NBC News

title: Trump warns of ‘invasion’ that will ‘destroy suburbia’
description: At a press conference, President Trump said that building low income housing would make suburbs “get hurt badly” and that suburbs should be something people should aspire to.

title: Homecoming king and queen tie the knot three decades later
description: Three decades after winning homecoming king and queen, Janet Fenner and Greg Dabice tied the knot on their alma mater’s football field after reuniting on a dating app last year.

title: Challenges of remote learning for students learning English as second language
description: 5 million public school students are learning English as a second language, a challenge that can be especially hard for Latino students learning remotely amid the pandemic since more than 40 percent of Latino families don’t have a computer.
